verses.verse: It happened, <S%H1471><s%> when all the nation had completely <S%H8552><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Take <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> out of the people, <S%H5971><s%> out of every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%>

and command <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H5375><s%> 'Take from out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> out of the place where the priests <S%H3548><s%>' feet <S%H7272><s%> stood <S%H4673><s%> firm, <S%H3559><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and carry them over <S%H5674><s%> with you, <S%H3240><s%> and lay them down in the lodging place, <S%H4411><s%> where you will lodge <S%H3885><s%> tonight. <S%H3915><s%>'"

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the twelve <S%H8147><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> whom he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man. <S%H376><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H5674><s%> "Pass over before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and each <S%H259><s%> of you <S%H376><s%> pick up <S%H7311><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%> and put it on your shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

that this may be a sign <S%H226><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> that when your children ask <S%H7592><s%> in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H68><s%> 'What do you mean by these stones?'

then you shall tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H4325><s%> 'Because the waters of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> When it passed over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off. <S%H3772><s%> These stones <S%H68><s%> shall be for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>'"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and took up <S%H5375><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they carried them over <S%H5674><s%> with them to the place where they lodged, <S%H4411><s%> and laid them down there. <S%H3240><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the place where the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> stood; <S%H4673><s%> and they are there to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

For the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> until everything <S%H1697><s%> was finished <S%H8552><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> according to all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> and passed over. <S%H5674><s%>

It happened, <S%H5971><s%> when all the people had completely <S%H8552><s%> passed over, <S%H5674><s%> that the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> passed over, <S%H5674><s%> with the priests, <S%H3548><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke to them. <S%H1696><s%>

About forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, <S%H2502><s%> ready and armed for war <S%H6635><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> to the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

On that day, <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they feared <S%H3372><s%> him, <S%H3372><s%> as they feared Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that they come up <S%H5927><s%> out of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore commanded <S%H6680><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> out of the Jordan! <S%H3383><s%>"

It happened, <S%H3548><s%> when the priests who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had come up <S%H5927><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>' feet <S%H7272><s%> were lifted up <S%H5423><s%> to the dry ground, <S%H2724><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to their place, <S%H4725><s%> and went over <S%H3212><s%> all its banks, <S%H1415><s%> as <S%H8543><s%> before. <S%H8032><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> out of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> border <S%H7097><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> up those twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> which they took out <S%H3947><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>

He spoke <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When your children <S%H1121><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H68><s%> 'What do these stones mean?'
Then you shall let your children <S%H1121><s%> know, <S%H3045><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3478><s%> 'Israel came over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on dry land. <S%H3004><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H5674><s%> until you had passed over, as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> which he dried up <S%H3001><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us, <S%H5674><s%> until we had passed over;

that all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that it is mighty; <S%H2389><s%> that you may fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> forever. <S%H3117><s%>'"
